subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Teemu Selanne, the oldest player in the N.H.L. at 42, is playing for what may be the best Ducks team in the franchise’s 20 years. Selanne is playing as relaxed as ever, but a title could offer an enticing exit.
snippet: Teemu Selanne, the oldest player in the N.H.L. at 42, is playing for what may be the best Ducks team in the franchise’s 20 years. Selanne is playing as relaxed as ever, but a title could offer an enticing exit.
